price: (2) But they wonder that there has come to them a warner from among themselves, and the disbelievers say, "This is an amazing thing.
arabic: بَلۡ عَجِبُوٓاْ أَن جَآءَهُم مُّنذِرٞ مِّنۡهُمۡ فَقَالَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرُونَ هَٰذَا شَيۡءٌ عَجِيبٌ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: bal ʿajibū an jāahum mundhirun min'hum faqāla al-kāfirūna hādhā shayon ʿajībun
